attributes.name: data-attributes
attributes.description: Sets one or more attribute values using a set of key-value pairs that map to the attribute name and expression.

attributes.name: data-attributes-*
attributes.description: Sets an elementâ€™s attribute value based on an expression.

attributes.name: data-bind
attributes.description: Creates a new signal and enables two-way binding between it and the element.

attributes.name: data-bind-*
attributes.description: Creates a new signal and enables two-way binding between it and the element.

attributes.name: data-class
attributes.description: Adds or removes one or more classes from an element using a set of key-value pairs that map to the class name and expression.

attributes.name: data-class-*
attributes.description: Adds or removes a class from an element based on an expression.

attributes.name: data-computed-*
attributes.description: Creates a signal that is computed based on an expression.

attributes.name: data-indicator
attributes.description: Creates a signal to track in-flight backend requests.

attributes.name: data-indicator-*
attributes.description: Creates a signal to track in-flight backend requests.

attributes.name: data-intersect
attributes.description: Executes an expression on intersection with the viewport.

attributes.name: data-signals
attributes.description: Merges one or more signals into the existing signals using a set of key-value pairs that map to the signal name and expression.

attributes.name: data-signals-*
attributes.description: Merges a signal into the existing signals.

attributes.name: data-on-*
attributes.description: Executes an expression whenever an event is triggered on an element.

attributes.name: data-on-click
attributes.description: Executes an expression whenever the element is clicked.

attributes.name: data-on-keydown
attributes.description: Executes an expression whenever a key is pressed.

attributes.name: data-on-load
attributes.description: Executes an expression whenever the element is loaded into the DOM.

attributes.name: data-on-signal-change
attributes.description: Executes an expression whenever a signal changes.

attributes.name: data-on-raf
attributes.description: Executes an expression on every `requestAnimationFrame` event.

attributes.name: data-ref
attributes.description: Creates a signal whose value references an element.

attributes.name: data-ref-*
attributes.description: Creates a signal whose value references an element.

attributes.name: data-replace-url
attributes.description: Replaces the URL in the browser with an evaluated expression.

attributes.name: data-scroll-into-view
attributes.description: Scrolls the element into view.

attributes.name: data-show
attributes.description: Shows or hides an element based on whether an expression evaluates to `true` or `false`.

attributes.name: data-text
attributes.description: Sets the text content of an element to the evaluated expression.

attributes.name: data-view-transition
attributes.description: Sets the value of `view-transition-name` for use with the View Transition API.
